recipe_name: Black pepper-crusted mackerel with a celery salad
author: James Martin
method: For the black pepper-crusted mackerel, heat the grill to hot. Brush the mackerel fillets with the mustard and roll the fillets in the black pepper. Place on a baking tray and put under the grill for 3-4 minutes. For the celery salad, put all the ingredients in a large bowl and mix together. For the dressing, put all the dressing ingredients in a small bowl and whisk. Just before serving pour the dressing over the salad To serve, place the mackerel fillets on each of four plates with the salad alongside.
